channel.title: Big release! 2spec reloaded!
channel.description:
This is a reloaded version of 2specs client. It has much more features that are similar to todays runescape but still has that old runescape style
Client is being uploaded now(It's a direct download link): http://download807.mediafire.com/4w1ssjry6j1g/2v4spti9sh1op1g/2spec+Reloaded.rar
Also to get the configurations to work you have to run the server first or their wont be any monster spawns ect in the config files.
[IMG]http://www.palidino.com/advertise/player_count.png[/img]
WARNING!!! These pictures below do not represent the entire server, I may have added or not many more features/quests/areas that I did not post pictures too.
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/2-1.jpg[/img] Old style runescape Clan chat!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/4-1.jpg[/img] Old style runescape clan chat with friend added!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/5.jpg[/img] Quests!(will add more as the days go on)
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/7.jpg[/img] Quest requirement page!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/8.jpg[/img] Old style Select an option!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/9.jpg[/img] Old style runescape minigame
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/13.jpg[/img] Old style inventory and weapons!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/11.jpg[/img] You can choose through a variety of safe and dangerous minigames!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/13.jpg[/img] Some of our top players who were willing to let us screenshot!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/12.jpg[/img] Another top player!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/14.jpg[/img] Mining rocks all in one location for your smithing or mining needs!
[IMG]http://i618.photobucket.com/albums/tt264/Patriotfrosh15/15.jpg[/img] Thieving in catherby!
Thanks for using Cod3r's Pserver!

ehmmm Ballscape A little bit edited But io liked it repp++
